sources.title: Bruce (Full Movie) Buddy Comedy, 2019
sources.description:
Repressed artist meets his Id in the form of 143 pounds of imaginary best friend.

Directed by Phebe Szatmari
2019
Starring Christopher Bayon, Anthony Guerino, Evan Altshuler

Edited for YouTube ad standards
